divs: Sighting Detailsme and a freind were laying on top of a shed looking at the stars and watchingfor meteors.it was late at night in the summer.no wind and extremely clear withno light pollution.we could practically see each horizon.we first noticed a verybright light coming up from the western horizon.it came to a sudden stop,thenmoved in a huge u shaped arc then came to a sudden stop.it must have covered afew miles in lest than a second.it repeated this exact pattern until itdissapeared on the opposite eastern horizon.we were both scared because thismovement was beyond any thing we could explain.im 46 years old now and ive beenan aircraft mech.for the past 20 years,so i know alittle about inertia andphysics and the memory is still vivid to me and i know till this day it couldnthave been man made.ive never told anyone about this except for a few closefreinds.ive always thought no one would believe me.has anyone else seensomething similar during this time sincerely ,TONY GAFFORD
Summary: saw bright light,moving against my knowledge of ph
